casebody.data:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent
v.
Steven Winfield COCHRAN, II, Petitioner No. 563 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. December 28, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 28th day of December, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:

Whether the Superior Court, in a line of cases going back to 2004, has gradually eroded the General Assembly's plain mandate established in 18 Pa.C.S. § 1106(c) that restitution must be set at the time of sentencing?
